00050  */

00062 /* This function takes two angles in radians
00063  * and returns the smallest angle between them in radians
00064  */
00065

00067         #define M_PI        3.14159265358979323846
00068 #endif

00070 // Convert radians to degrees
00071 #define RTOD(r) ((r) * 180 / M_PI)
00072 
00073 // Convert degrees to radians
00074 #define DTOR(d) ((d) * M_PI / 180)
00075 
00076 // Normalize angle to domain -pi, pi
00077 #define NORMALIZE(z) atan2(sin(z), cos(z))

00079 //compares two real numbers. Returns true if they are equal
00080 inline bool isEqual(float a, float b)
00081 {
00082   if (fabs(a-b) < 1E-12)
00083   {
00084     return true;
00085   }
00086 
00087   return false;
00088 }
00089 
00090 inline bool isEqual(double a, double b)
00091 {
00092   if (fabs(a-b) < 1E-12)
00093   {
00094     return true;
00095   }
00096 
00097   return false;
00098 }

00170     return yp;

00173 inline Point &Point::operator+=(const Point &p)
00174 {
00175     xp+=p.xp;
00176     yp+=p.yp;
00177     return *this;
00178 }
00180 inline Point &Point::operator-=(const Point &p)
00181 {
00182     xp-=p.xp; yp-=p.yp; return *this;

00185 inline Point &Point::operator*=(double c)
00186 {
00187     xp*=c; yp*=c; return *this;
00188 }
00190 inline bool operator==(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00191 {
00192     return isEqual(p1.xp,p2.xp) && isEqual(p1.yp,p2.yp);
00193 }
00195 inline bool operator!=(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00196 {
00197     return !isEqual(p1.xp,p2.xp) || !isEqual(p1.yp,p2.yp);
00198 }
00200 inline const Point operator+(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00201 {
00202     return Point(p1.xp+p2.xp, p1.yp+p2.yp);
00203 }
00205 inline const Point operator-(const Point &p1, const Point &p2)
00206 {
00207     return Point(p1.xp-p2.xp, p1.yp-p2.yp);
00208 }
00210 inline const Point operator*(const Point &p, double c)
00211 {
00212     return Point(p.xp*c, p.yp*c);
00213 }
00215 inline const Point operator*(double c, const Point &p)
00216 {
00217     return Point(p.xp*c, p.yp*c);
00218 }
00220 inline const Point operator-(const Point &p)
00221 {
00222     return Point(-p.xp, -p.yp);
00223 }
00225 inline Point &Point::operator/=(double c)
00226 {
00227     xp/=c;
00228     yp/=c;
00229     return *this;
00230 }
00232 inline const Point operator/(const Point &p, double c)
00233 {
00234     return Point(p.xp/c, p.yp/c);
00235 }
00236 inline double Dist(Point a, Point b)
00237 {
00238         return sqrt(pow(a.x() - b.x(),2) + pow(a.y() - b.y(),2));
00239 }
00240 class Line
00241 {
00242         public:
00244                 Point start;
00246                 Point end;
00248                 Line(){};
00250                 Line(Point a,Point b): start(a),end(b) {};
00252                 void SetStart(Point a) 
00253                 {
00254                         start = a;
00255                 }
00257                 void SetEnd(Point a) 
00258                 {
00259                         end = a;
00260                 }
00262                 double LineMag()
00263                 {
00264                         Point V = end - start;
00265                         return sqrt(V.x()*V.x() + V.y()*V.y());
00266                 }
00267 };

00269 class Pose
00270 {       
00271 public :
00273         Point p;
00275         double phi;     
00277         Pose(){};
00279         Pose(double x ,double y,double theta)
00280         {
00281                 p.setX(x);
00282                 p.setY(y);
00283                 phi = theta;
00284         }
00285 //      Pose & operator=(const Pose &ps)
00286 //      {
00287 //              this->p.setX(ps.p.x());
00288 //              this->p.setY(ps.p.y());
00289 //              this->phi = ps.phi;
00290 //              return * this;
00291 //      }
00293         bool operator==(const Pose& pose) const
00294         {
00295         return (isEqual(p.x(), pose.p.x()) && isEqual(p.y(),pose.p.y()) && isEqual(phi,pose.phi));
00296         }
00298         bool operator!=(const Pose& pose) const
00299         {
00300         return (p.x()!=pose.p.x() || p.y()!=pose.p.y() || phi != pose.phi);
00301         }
00302 };
00303 // computes the signed minimum difference between the two angles.
00304 inline double anglediffs(double a, double b)
00305 {
00306   double d1, d2;
00307   a = NORMALIZE(a);
00308   b = NORMALIZE(b);
00309   d1 = a-b;
00310   d2 = 2*M_PI - fabs(d1);
00311   if(d1 > 0)
00312     d2 *= -1.0;
00313   if(fabs(d1) < fabs(d2))
00314     return(d1);
00315   else
00316     return(d2);
00317 };
00318 
00319 inline double anglediff(double alfa, double beta) 
00320 {
00321 //      double diff;
00322 //      diff = beta - alfa;
00323 //      if (diff > M_PI)
00324 //      {
00325 //      diff -= 2 * M_PI;
00326 //      }
00327 //      else if (diff < -M_PI) 
00328 //      {
00329 //      diff += 2 * M_PI;
00330 //      }       
00331         double diff;
00332         if( alfa < 0 ) alfa+= 2*M_PI;   if( alfa > 2*M_PI) alfa-= 2*M_PI;
00333         if( beta < 0 ) beta+= 2*M_PI;   if( beta > 2*M_PI) beta-= 2*M_PI;               
00334         diff = alfa - beta;
00335         if ( diff >  M_PI) diff=( 2*M_PI  - diff);
00336         if ( diff < -M_PI) diff=(-2*M_PI - diff);
00337         return Abs(diff);
00338 };

00340 inline double ATAN2(Point a,Point b)
00341 {
00342         return atan2(a.y() - b.y(), a.x() - b.x());
00343 }
00344 inline Point Rotate(Point p,double angle)
00345 {
00346         // Rotate 
00347         Point temp; temp.setX(p.x()); temp.setY(p.y());
00348         p.setX(temp.x()*cos(angle) - temp.y()*sin(angle));
00349         p.setY(temp.x()*sin(angle) + temp.y()*cos(angle));
00350         return p;
00351 }
00352 
00353 inline Point Trans2Global(Point p,Pose pose)
00354 {
00355         // Rotate + Translate
00356         Point temp; temp.setX(p.x()); temp.setY(p.y());
00357         p.setX(temp.x()*cos(pose.phi) - temp.y()*sin(pose.phi) + pose.p.x());
00358         p.setY(temp.x()*sin(pose.phi) + temp.y()*cos(pose.phi) + pose.p.y());
00359         return p;
00360 }
00361 
00362 inline Pose Trans2Global(Pose p,Pose pose)
00363 {
00364         // Rotate + Translate
00365         Point temp; temp.setX(p.p.x()); temp.setY(p.p.y());
00366         p.p.setX(temp.x()*cos(pose.phi) - temp.y()*sin(pose.phi) + pose.p.x());
00367         p.p.setY(temp.x()*sin(pose.phi) + temp.y()*cos(pose.phi) + pose.p.y());
00368         p.phi = NORMALIZE(p.phi + pose.phi);
00369         return p;
00370 }
